thread.section_title: Hilton Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value and location!
thread.title_full: Good value and location! - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kathie P
title: Good value and location!
text: This was a great location for our quick visit it NYC to see a show. Friendly service and great views! Handy to theater district, subway and many, many good restaurants. The adjacent restaurant served a good and reasonably priced breakfast. Rooms were clean, well-kept, and not quite so "New York City hotel tiny."
